titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the State of Ohio the Senecaville National Fish Hatchery.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Management.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries. H. Rept. 103-203.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 114.

action.text: Mr. Studds moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 476 ordered to be reported.

bill.summary: 6/23/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the conveyance, without reimbursement, of all U.S. interest in the Senecaville National Fish Hatchery to the State of Ohio solely for the Ohio fishery resources management program.
